  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105822</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Poet's New Post - Creating Poetry Using the Words of Poet Laureate Charles Simic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neuer Pfosten eines Dichters - Erstellen von von 
Poesie, die Wörter des Dichter-Laureatus Charles Simic verwendend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le nouveau poteau d'un poèt - créer la poésie 
en utilisant les mots du lauréat de poèt Charles Simic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Borne novo de um poeta - criando a poesia usando 
as palavras do laureate de poeta Charles Simic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nuovo alberino del poet - creare poesia usando le 
parole del laureate di poet Charles Simic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το νέο ταχυδρομείο ενός ποιητή - που δημιουργεί την 
ποίηση που χρησιμοποιεί τις λέξεις του δαφνοστεφή Charles 
Simic ποιητών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nuevo poste de un poeta - crear poesía usando las
palabras del laureado de poeta Charles Simic</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will explore the poetry of Charles Simic, America's new Poet Laureate, and use his words to inspire their own writing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erforschen Kursteilnehmer die 
Poesie von Charles Simic, Amerikas neuer Dichter-Laureatus und 
verwenden seine Wörter, um ihr eigenes Schreiben anzuspornen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants exploreront la 
poésie de Charles Simic, nouveau lauréat de poèt de l'Amérique, et
emploient ses mots pour inspirer leur propre écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes explorarão a poesia 
de Charles Simic, laureate de poeta novo de América, e usam suas 
palavras inspirar sua própria escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi esploreranno la 
poesia di Charles Simic, nuovo laureate di poet dell'America ed usano 
le sue parole per ispirare la loro propria scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα ερευνήσουν την 
ποίηση Charles Simic, νέος δαφνοστεφής ποιητών της 
Αμερικής, και θα χρησιμοποιήσουν τις λέξεις του για να εμπνεύσουν 
το γράψιμό τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes explorarán la 
poesía de Charles Simic, nuevo laureado de poeta de América, y 
utilizan sus palabras para inspirar su propia escritura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        </lifeCycle>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

  </manifestation>
